history.proof: intros Hfind Hpt. unfold pt_PhaseTwoAbort in Hpt. destruct Hpt. - apply H. - split. + shelve. + split. * shelve. * shelve. + shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid m : TaggedMessage pt, round : nat next_data : data lg : Log Hfind : find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} H : [/\\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] Unable to unify "[/\\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]" with "pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt \\/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
i: Ordered.sort mid
m: TaggedMessage
round: nat
pt: nat
next_data: data
lg: Log

Goal:
find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Notation seq := list
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
from : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
to : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
data = seq nid : Set
abort_req = 4 : nat
msg_spec = fun (from to : nid) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) => msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) : nid -> nid -> nat_eqType -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> soup -> Prop
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
nid = nat : Set
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
pt_state = fun (d : dstatelet) (p : PStateT) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => loc pt d = st :-> p \+ log :-> l : dstatelet -> PStateT -> Log -> nid -> Prop
pt_PhaseTwoAbort = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons l (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive PState : Set := PInit : PState | PGotRequest : data -> PState | PRespondedYes : data -> PState | PRespondedNo : data -> PState | PCommitted : data -> PState | PAborted : data -> PState
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
commit_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
prep_no_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_no -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]
prep_yes_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_yes -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)]
prep_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)]
abort_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = abort_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
commit_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = commit_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
pt_PhaseOne = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PGotRequest next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : d...
pt_PhaseTwoCommit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PCommitted next_data) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoCommit _ _%nat_scope
pt_PhaseOneResponded = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (committed : bool) (pt : nid) => [/\ no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d), no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & if committed then pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt else pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> bool -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseOneResponded _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%bool_scope
prep_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = prep_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseOne d round next_data lg
EverythingInit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) => cn_state d (round, CInit) l /\ (forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)]) : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> Prop Arguments EverythingInit _ _%nat_scope
pt_Init = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)] : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_Init _ _%nat_scope
pt_PhaseTwoResponded = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : seq nat) (l : seq (bool * seq nat)) (b : bool) (pt : nid) => [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (b, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] : dstatelet -> nat -> seq nat -> seq (bool * seq nat) -> bool -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoResponded _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%seq_scope _%bool_scope
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid m : TaggedMessage pt : nat round : nat next_data : data lg : Log |- Type] ?P : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid m : TaggedMessage pt : nat round : nat next_data : data lg : Log |- ?A -> Type]
cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitAckAbort next_data recvd) l, uniq recvd, {subset recvd <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in recvd then pt_PhaseTwoResponded d round next_data l false pt else pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> (pt != from) || (to != to') -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentAbort next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt else exists b : bool, pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentCommit next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt else pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l true pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitAckCommit next_data recvd) l, uniq recvd, {subset recvd <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in recvd then pt_PhaseTwoResponded d round next_data l true pt else pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet i : mid m : TaggedMessage pt : nat round : nat next_data : data lg : Log |- Type]
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
TwoPhaseProtocol.TPCProtocol.pn_gen_send_trans_obligation_1 : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall t : ttag, t \in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack] -> forall (ps : data -> PState) (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> send_prep_resp_prec ps s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
step_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
step_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
pn_send_trans : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (ptag : ttag) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1) -> bool -> Transitions.send_trans (TPCCoh cn pts others)
tpc_coh = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) => [/\ soupCoh cn pts (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes cn pts others, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes cn pts others -> localCoh cn pts n (loc n d)] : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments tpc_coh _ (_ _)%seq_scope
msg_spec_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (from to tg : nat) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (cnt' : seq nat) (i : mid), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt' |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> no_msg_from_to from to (consume_msg s i)
rely_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
rely_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
pn_step_coh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (ptag : ttag) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1) -> forall commit : bool, s_step_coh_t (TPCCoh cn pts others) ptag (pn_step commit)
no_msg_from_consume : forall (from : nid) (from' to : nat) (s : union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from'; to := to; active := true |} -> valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> no_msg_from from (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_to' = fun (from to : nat) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> ~~ criterion t c : nat -> nat -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to' (_ _)%nat_scope _%function_scope
cohStP : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in pts -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (loc n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT
no_msg_to = fun (to : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
no_msg_from = fun (from : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (to : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope

```coq
intros Hfind Hpt.
unfold pt_PhaseTwoAbort in Hpt.
destruct Hpt.
- left. apply H.
- right. split.
  + apply H.
  + split.
    * apply H0.
    * apply H1.
```

original: intros Hfind Hpt. unfold pt_PhaseTwoAbort in Hpt. destruct Hpt. - left. apply H. - right. split. + apply H. + split. * apply H0. * apply H1.
